mapper.select: SELECT artisan_id AS artisanId, artisan_name AS artisanName, artisan_type AS artisanType FROM ARTISAN ORDER BY artisan_id ASC
SELECT artisan_id AS artisanId, artisan_name AS artisanName, artisan_type AS artisanType FROM ARTISAN WHERE LOWER(artisan_type) = LOWER(#{artisanType}) ORDER BY artisan_id ASC

SELECT p.player_id AS playerId, p.player_name AS playerName, p.primary_archetype_id AS primaryArchetypeId, p.is_active AS isActive FROM PLAYER p INNER JOIN PLAYER_ARTISAN pa ON p.player_id = pa.player_id INNER JOIN ARTISAN a ON pa.artisan_id = a.artisan_id WHERE LOWER(a.artisan_name) = LOWER(#{artisanName})
